# deepHexlify

Recursively converts all values in an object to hex strings

## Import

```ts
import { deepHexlify } from "@aa-sdk/core";
```

## Parameters

### obj

`any`

- obj to deep hexlify

## Returns

`any`
object with all of its values hexlified
